title: 820-3332 - ppbus_g3h low
message:
The Board is pretty clean.
All the rails is there, however, the PPBUS_G3H is around 12.13V To low and don't detects the battery.
Any hint?

title: 820-3332 - ppbus_g3h low
message:
Post exact voltage and dioe mode to ground on SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.
Also check resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of ISL5259.

title: 820-3332 - ppbus_g3h low
message: And inspect for corrosion near the SMC

title: 820-3332 - ppbus_g3h low
message:
[USER="682"]2informaticos[/USER] 17/18 = 4.3 (supposed to be around 4)
                                27/28 = 21.7 (was supposed to be around 20)  

[USER="1153"]JohnB8812[/USER]     SMC is pretty clean. I tested pins 10-11 ISL to SMC and is fine.

title: 820-3332 - ppbus_g3h low
message: 12.13 is too low regardless. SMC_RESET_L voltage? If 3.3, then likely bad ISL6259 or bad SMC. If low, figure out why.

title: 820-3332 - ppbus_g3h low
message:
"Post exact voltage and dioe mode to ground on SCL/SDA lines of battery bus."
???
You are loosing time...
